title: Application for Sustainable Production
subtitle: Analyze, validate, and document that your production is deforestation-free and complies with local regulations and EUDR.

validation.title: Polygon and Point Validation
validation.description: Download the template, fill in the data, and upload it to automatically validate overlaps or duplicates.

deforestation.title: Deforestation Analysis
deforestation.description: Identify the risk of disturbance for one or more farms, and compare it with global data sources.

batches.title: Batch Creation
batches.description: Facilitate traceability control and compliance with sustainability standards.

report.title: Due Diligence Generation
report.description: Support your production information to meet international regulations.

polygonValidation.title: The same data will be used for validation
polygonValidation.description: You can view the already uploaded information or upload new data.

deforestationAnalysis.title: The same data will be used for the deforestation analysis
deforestationAnalysis.description: You can view the already uploaded information or upload new data.
